about_the_game:
About the Game

Recoil Rush is a revolutionary fast-paced movement shooter that flips the traditional FPS mechanics on their head. In this adrenaline-fueled game, every move you make is powered by the recoil from firing your weapon. Whether you're soaring through the air, dodging enemy fire, or pulling off mind-bending stunts, mastering the art of recoil is key to becoming the ultimate champion.

Recoil-based Movement

In Recoil Rush, there’s no walking, running, or jumping in the conventional sense. Your only way of navigating the world is through the recoil generated by your weapon. Each shot propels you in the opposite direction, and every decision counts. Do you shoot for an offensive attack or use your shot to maneuver out of danger? The choice is yours, but every action has a consequence.

Projectiles With Unique Stats

Choose from a diverse arsenal of over 20 unique projectiles, each offering different stats and strategic possibilities. Projectiles vary in:
  • Damage: Deliver a powerful hit to take down your foes.
  • Knockback: Control the intensity of your recoil to navigate with precision.
  • Speed: Select the perfect velocity for quick adjustments or long-range tactics.
  • Size: Choose between small and precise, big and unwieldy, or anything in between.
  • Explosion Size: Trigger explosions when your shot lands that launch everything in the vicinity.
  • Number of Ricochets: Bounce your shots around corners and into tricky spots.
  • Cooldown: Time your shots and manage your resources carefully.

Single-player Mission Mode

Embark on a thrilling journey through over 40 handcrafted levels, each designed to test your skills and creativity. From navigating treacherous obstacles to taking down formidable enemies, every level offers a new challenge. Compete on public leaderboards for each level, pushing yourself to achieve faster times and higher scores. Will you rise to the top?

Experimental Multiplayer Mode

Take the battle online in Recoil Rush’s experimental multiplayer mode, featuring four intense game modes:

  • Free For All: Every player for themselves in this chaotic, all-out brawl. Outsmart, outmaneuver, and outshoot your opponents to claim victory.
  • Team Deathmatch: Join forces with your friends in team-based combat. Coordinate your moves and dominate the opposition.
  • King of the Hill: Control the hill to score points, but beware—holding your ground is easier said than done in a game where movement is so dynamic.
  • Team King of the Hill: Work with your team to control the hill, combining strategy and skill to outplay your rivals.

Maps

Explore 3 intricately designed multiplayer maps, each offering unique challenges and opportunities for creative recoil-based movement. Learn the ins and outs of each map to gain the upper hand in your matches.

Join the Community

Recoil Rush is more than just a game; it’s a growing community of players who thrive on speed, skill, and innovation. Share your strategies, discuss your favorite projectile loadouts, and compete against each other to prove who’s the best of the best.

Prepare to rethink everything you know about shooters. In Recoil Rush, every shot is a move, and every move is a shot. How far can your recoil take you?

name: Recoil Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650, 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 255, 2GB, Intel Iris XE
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Recoil Rush is a fast-paced movement shooter where your weapon’s recoil is your only means of movement. Master the art of propulsion as you blast through over 40 challenging levels in the single-player mission mode and go head to head against other players in multiplayer.
